name: Apothecary Miseria
description:
Take the role of Aurelia: an insidious apothecary who just wants to watch the world burn! Or rather, kill everyone by selling her poisoned potions to the unwary. Sell enough potions to enough customers each day to let the plot unfold.

Controls: Space and Left Click do things.

Made with Godot, with sounds/music from ZapSplatt and fonts from DaFont.

Made in about 3 days for Minijam-129: Poison.
